text:
Hello all!  We have a <https://www.HubSpot.com/careers/jobs/2435028|job> at HubSpot that you should look at!
I want to emphasize this from the listing:
> _Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But we’ll let you in on a secret: there’s no such thing as a ‘perfect’ candidate. HubSpot is a place where everyone can grow. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day._
Take that quote seriously!
